name: Cinemabition (21T2)
description:
Cinemabition is a playable exhibition featuring many of the projects created by Games students during Trimester 2 2021 at SAE's Brisbane Campus.

Featured Projects

  • GAD174  - Lucid Alpine Experience
  • GAD174  - Prison Break
  • GAD174 - Omari's Crypt
  • GAD181 - LuftRanger
  • GAD181 - Quietus
  • GAD181 - DrakonBorG
  • GAD181 - Buzz Bomber
  • GAD181 - Nyan Platformer
  • GAD181 - Siege Of Crete
  • Studio 1 - DriveSafe-Car Sim
  • Studio 1 - Tales From Soup Kingdom
  • Studio 1 - Where The Trees Grow
  • Studio 1 - Day Zero
  • CIM210 - Pheonix Uprising
  • Studio 3 - Fwiendship
  • Studio 3 - HexaMaze
  • Studio 3 - Doge World
  • Studio 3 - Sandcastles VR
  • Studio 3 - Expand N Conquer
  • CIU212 - The Last Knight
  • CIU330 - Dungeon Dater

Cinemabition Team (21T1)

  • Noran Linggod
  • Baylee Windebank
